arts.ttl: Cristian Chivu Praises Argentina Megastar As ‘A True Leader Who’s A Joy To Coach’ – Praises ‘Desire To Be Dominant’ As Inter Milan Take Revenge On Lazio
arts.sum: Inter Milan head coach Cristian Chivu hailed his team’s performance and Lautaro Martinez’s leadership after a commanding 2–0 victory over Lazio at San Siro. It was a result that lifted the Nerazzurri back to the top of Serie A alongside Roma. arts.ttl: Two-goal Inter beat Lazio to go top of Serie A
arts.sum: Inter Milan beat Lazio 2-0 at the San Siro to go top of Serie A.
